title: Power BI Modeling   Change the Status Log Table to a From To Table
excerpt: It is common that you face a status table in your data analysis scenarios. A status table normally has a column for the status of the items and the date of status change. This type of table, although informative, can be hard for analyzing data. In this article and video, Iâ€™ll explain why it is better
